verbs.description: [ARG1: runner] [V: is] [ARG2: 1st athlete with cerebral palsy to sign with nike justin gallegos] now goes to the university of oregon and is in the school running club he making history as the first athlete with cerebral palsy to seal a deal with nike justin gallegos calif nike wabc university of oregon cerebral palsy santa clarita
